#### [Exercise 14.3](#ex143q) {-}

\vspace{-0.2cm}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item Sketches showing turning points and roots:
    \begin{multicols}{2}
            \begin{tikzpicture}
            \draw[white] (-0.5,-2) rectangle (6.6,2);
            \draw[-stealth] (0,0) -- (6.4,0) node[above] {$x$};
            \draw[-stealth] (0,-1.2) -- (0,1.6) node[left] {$y$};
            \draw[thick,smooth,xshift=0.61cm,domain=-0.61:5.673] plot (\x,{cos(\x r)});
            \node[below] at (2*3.141592,0) {$360$};
            \node[below] at (3.141592,0) {$180$};
            \draw[fill] (0.61,1) circle (0.05) node[above right] {$(35\degree,7)$};
            \draw[fill] (3.141592+0.61,-1) circle (0.05) node[below] {$(215\degree,-7)$};
            \draw[fill] (0.5*3.141592+0.61,0) circle (0.05) node[above right] {$125\degree$};
            \draw[fill] (1.5*3.141592+0.61,0) circle (0.05) node[above left] {$305\degree$};
            \node[left] at (0,1) {$7$};
            \node[left] at (0,0) {$0$};
            \node[left] at (0,-1) {$-7$};
            \foreach \x in {0.5,1,1.5,2}{
            \draw (3.141592*\x,0) -- (3.141592*\x,-0.1);
}
            \end{tikzpicture}
        \columnbreak  
        \vfill
        a) $y=7\cos{(x-35)}\degree$:
        \begin{itemize}
            \item maximum turning point at $(35\degree,7)$
            \item minimum turning point at $(215\degree,-7)$
            \item $x$-intercepts at $(125\degree,0)$ and $(305\degree,0)$
        \end{itemize}
        \end{multicols}
        \begin{multicols}{2}
            \begin{tikzpicture}
            \draw[white] (-0.5,-2) rectangle (6.6,2);
            \draw[-stealth] (0,0) -- (6.4,0) node[above] {$x$};
            \draw[-stealth] (0,-1.2) -- (0,1.6) node[left] {$y$};
            \draw[thick,smooth,xshift=0.4cm,domain=-0.4:5.883] plot (\x,{sin(\x r)});
            \draw[fill] (0.5*3.141592+0.4,1) circle (0.05) node[above] {$(113\degree,3)$};
            \draw[fill] (1.5*3.141592+0.4,-1) circle (0.05) node[below] {$(293\degree,-3)$};
            \draw[fill] (3.141592+0.4,0) circle (0.05) node[above right] {$203\degree$};
            \draw[fill] (0*3.141592+0.4,0) circle (0.05) node[below right] {$23\degree$};
            \node[below] at (2*3.141592,0) {$360$};
            \node[below] at (3.141592,0) {$180$};
            \node[left] at (0,1) {$3$};
            \node[left] at (0,0) {$0$};
            \node[left] at (0,-1) {$-3$};
            \foreach \x in {0.5,1,1.5,2}{
            \draw (3.141592*\x,0) -- (3.141592*\x,-0.1);
}
            \end{tikzpicture}
        \columnbreak    
        \vfill
        b) $y=3\sin{(x-23)}\degree$:
        \begin{itemize}
            \item maximum turning point at $(113\degree,3)$
            \item minimum turning point at $(293\degree,-3)$
            \item $x$-intercepts at $(23\degree,0)$ and $(203\degree,0)$
        \end{itemize}
        \end{multicols}
        \begin{multicols}{2}
            \begin{tikzpicture}
            \draw[white] (-0.5,-2) rectangle (6.6,2);
            \draw[-stealth] (0,0) -- (6.4,0) node[above] {$x$};
            \draw[-stealth] (0,-1.2) -- (0,1.6) node[left] {$y$};
            \draw[thick,smooth,xshift=-0.716cm,domain=0.716:6.999] plot (\x,{cos(\x r)});
            \draw[fill] (2*3.141592-0.716,1) circle (0.05) node[above] {$(319\degree,\sqrt{5})$};
            \draw[fill] (1*3.141592-0.716,-1) circle (0.05) node[below] {$(139\degree,-\sqrt{5})$};
            \draw[fill] (0.5*3.141592-0.716,0) circle (0.05) node[above right] {$49\degree$};
            \draw[fill] (1.5*3.141592-0.716,0) circle (0.05) node[above left] {$229\degree$};
            \node[below] at (2*3.141592,0) {$360$};
            \node[below] at (3.141592,0) {$180$};
            \node[left] at (0,1) {$7$};
            \node[left] at (0,0) {$0$};
            \node[left] at (0,-1) {$-7$};
            \foreach \x in {0.5,1,1.5,2}{
            \draw (3.141592*\x,0) -- (3.141592*\x,-0.1);
}
            \end{tikzpicture}
        \columnbreak
        \vfill
        c) $y=\sqrt{5}\cos{(x+41)}\degree$:
        \begin{itemize}
            \item maximum turning point at $(319\degree,\sqrt{5})$
            \item minimum turning point at $(139\degree,-\sqrt{5})$
            \item $x$-intercepts at $(49\degree,0)$ and $(229\degree,0)$
        \end{itemize}
    \end{multicols}
    \item
    \begin{enumerate}
    \begin{multicols}{3}
        \item max value $8$ when $x\degree=140\degree$
        \item max value $\sqrt{2}$ when $x\degree=333\degree$
        \item max value $7$ when $x\degree=47.7\degree$
    \end{multicols}
    \end{enumerate}
    \item
    \begin{enumerate}
    \begin{multicols}{3}
        \item min value $-3$ when $x=\frac{7\pi}{6}$
        \item min value $-3$ when $x=\frac{7\pi}{6}$
        \item min value $-12$ when $x=\frac{\pi}{4}$
    \end{multicols}
    \end{enumerate}
    \item
    \begin{enumerate}
    \begin{multicols}{3}
        \item $\sqrt{85}\sin{(x-49.4)\degree}$
        \item max TP at $(139.4\degree,2\sqrt{85})$, min TP at $(219.4\degree,-2\sqrt{85})$
    \end{multicols}
    \end{enumerate}
\end{enumerate}
